comments.body: It's not needed here, but it is worth knowing that there is a package scoped static method `Filesystem.addFileSystemForTesting` to actually let you add a specific instance to the file system cache. I use sometimes as it lets me register mob file systems for existing schemes (s3, etc).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +137,141 @@object TestPaths {
  val hadoopConf = new Configuration()
  hadoopConf.set("fs.mockFs.impl", classOf[MockFileSystem].getName)

  val path1 = new Path("mockFs://mockFs/somepath1")
